Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Southport
ShortDescription: Brown Line service are still temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service are still temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Irving Park.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Southport at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • These may include #80 Irving Park buses to Sheridan Red Line station for continuing service downtown.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
